show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Validated Independent News
content:
Join Mickey Huff and Peter Phillips as they talk with former GA Congresswoman Cynthia McKinney about her new book as… part of the Dignity Project titled “The Illegal War on Lybia.
” At the bottom of the hour, Project Censored student intern Kimberly Soeiro talks about the most recent stories being researched as part of a new segment Project Censored’s Validated Independent News.
The show closes out with Prof.
Adam Bessie, contributor to the upcoming Censored 2013: Dispatches from the Media Revolution book, about his chapter GER.
M Warfare: How to Reclaim the Education Debate from Corporate Occupation and his recent work on a graphic novel on education published by Truthout.
